item.title: An expert interview about amazing gadgets
item.description: Logistic Regression Logistic Regression is a statistical method used for binary classification. It predicts the probability of a binary response based on one or more predictor variables. Key Concepts 1. Sigmoid Function The sigmoid function maps predicted values to probabilities: [ \sigma(z) = \frac{1}{1 + e^{-z}} ] where ( z = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x_1 + \beta_2 x_2 + \ldots + \beta_n x_n ). The sigmoid function outputs a value between 0 and 1, which can be interpreted as a probability.
